documents.document: @SeanHoganNZ @Allbirds Damn that late shift! I can't wait to hang with the cool, hip Allbird wearing people ahaha.

Overheard in the newsroom- "Don't say 'cookie', it's so American. Next thing I know you'll be saying 'vacation'."
Greg O'Connor on Peter Dunne- "If you stay around too long, it's bad for the organisation, it's bad for everyone. Go out at the top."

Tummy rumbling again in Wellington District Court. Send peanut butter.
I can report @PorkPieMovie is extremely heartwarming, inspires you to listen to more Dave Dobbyn and to go on a crazed NZ adventure.
Thought I got free tickets to a regular viewing of Pork Pie. Turns out it's a premiere. Actors and PM here. I'm wearing jeans and a jumper.
When you expect that yuck cigarette smell to waft over from the person walking in front of you, then you get grape. #vape
Had a nightmare last night about being served a weak cup of tea. Terrifying.

@JayHarvie @NZStuff When I interviewed a landlord about this he said 50 groups went to one viewing and he had 30 apps by the end of that day

Repeat! The front from the bomb low will now hit #wellington tomorrow morning... and you thought it was getting bad now.
There is rain, there are gusts more than 100kmh but @MetService says the worst of it will hit in rush hour traffic tomorrow AM. #Wellington
Work colleague: "I've got a pair of pliers here to defuse the weather bomb."
@beckeleven @sciencepaulg Our chats about the weather in the kitchen obviously paid off!
@pauleaglenz says he'll announce whether he's going for the Rongotai seat this week, hopes he'll have support if he chooses to do so.
Bomb low vs weather bomb. Acurracy vs dramatic effect.
@M_Cropp Haha so appealing! At this rate I'm moving to Khandallah to hide until the situation calms down.
Writing about the crap renting situation in Wellington is making me more and more stressed about securing a flat for this year. Hulp.

I'm happy for Richie and Gemma. I also really couldn't care less about their wedding festivities.

A man has died of a heart attack on the side of the road on SH1, north of Wellington.
Just as I'm walking out the door, phone rings and I'm back at my desk. 100% commitment to xmas holder stories from me.

Lois Tolley investigation- "An execution type killing."
